name: Wine Hummus
author: sueb
summary: Onions, garlic, and sesame seeds are sauteed in wine, then added to pinto beans for an adult hummus! Serve with vegetables or chips.
directions: Combine water and pinto beans in a saucepan; bring to a boil and cook for 2 minutes
Cover saucepan and remove from heat; let sit, at least 1 hour
Bring water back to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until beans are tender, about 45 minutes
Mix onions, red wine, sesame seeds, and garlic in a small saucepan; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring occasionally, until wine has evaporated, 5 to 10 minutes
Blend bean-water mixture in a blender until smooth; add onion mixture and blend until smooth
